        Parameters:
        fullName - A descriptive name for the account
        displayName - The name that will be displayed (should be optional and default to full name)
        balance - initial balance
        interestRate - Annual interest rate (optional, should default to 0)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Account other)
        Compares the balance of this account to another
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Account>
        Parameters:
        other - the Account to which we are comparing
        Returns:
